title: Cody Simpson drops new song Golden Thing about girlfriend Miley Cyrus
text:
Cody Simpson has dropped his Miley Cyrus tribute track, Golden Thing, and by the looks of it, the pair of them are absolutely smitten.

The singer, 22, has been teasing the new song on his Instagram story but it looks like he couldn’t wait to release it, as fans were treated to the mellow ballad on Friday.

Golden Thing – which has a picture of Miley’s neck as the background of the video – features lyrics including ‘Diamond throne / All on her own / Coffee skin / She let me in’ in ode to his new relationship with the Bangerz star.

Miley, 26, was also pretty impressed with the love song, posting a screenshot of the artwork on her Instagram story, captioned ‘My Heart’.

Cody and Miley have only been dating since the start of October, but things have got pretty serious pretty fast as the couple seem to be spending every waking moment together.

As well as posting several photos of them kissing, the couple even went to get tattooed together too – you know it’s official when you’re getting inked together…

According to Cody, it was Miley who urged him to put out Golden Thing, telling Hollywood Life: ‘I wrote her a song this week that she’s pretty much forcing me to put out.

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have only been dating since the start of October (Picture: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

‘She was like, “If you don’t put this s**t out, I’m putting it out on your behalf for you. I’m getting your Spotify login and doing this s**t myself.”’

Cody revealed that he had written the song for Miley while she was in hospital after being struck down with tonsillitis.

The Australian heartthrob turned up with flowers and his guitar to serenade her, with Miley posting on her story: ‘Suddenly I am feeling much better.

‘This sweeeeeet guy came to visit and the hospital and sang the sweeeeeetest song he wrote just for me.’
